General.Name: Lendoit
General.Description: Lendoit is a decentralized P2P Lending platform that provides all elements lending markets need to function. These include: Professional scoring and verification APIs for each country, a loan marketplace, where lenders bid interest rates on loan applications and a default market where failed loans can be traded. The Landoit smart loan contract also offers functions like syndicated loans and the ability to sell a loan to another lender if needed. LOAN is an ERC20 token based on the Ethereum blockchain. It is used as the main currency in the platform.

ICO.Description:
Lendoit is a decentralized P2P Lending platform that provides all elements lending markets need to function. These include: Professional scoring and verification APIs for each country, a loan marketplace, where lenders bid interest rates on loan applications and a default market where failed loans can be traded. The Landoit smart loan contract also offers functions like syndicated loans and the ability to sell a loan to another lender if needed. LOAN is an ERC20 token based on the Ethereum blockchain. It is used as the main currency in the platform.

 Team:

  • Ori Erez: Co-Founder & CEO 
  • Vlad Amirov: Co-Founder & CTO 
  • Yoav Pinkas: Co-Founder & COO  
  • Avi Ben David: Co-Founder & President

The Lendoit Pre-sale will start on November 7th and the main ICO will run from the 13th December until the 13th of January. The ICO token allocation represents 60% of the total token supply. Participants will be able to support the Landoit project with BTC and ETH.

Token Reserve Split (100%):

  • Team & Advisors: 15%
  • Early Contributors, Bounty & Loan reserve pool: 15%
  • Development: 10% Sale: 60%

The Lendoit ICO features a bonus and bounty campaign.
